publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1314 Colin Campbell: Congratulations to Scottish ENABLE India Charity Bike Riders—That the Parliament congratulates the two parliamentary researchers, John Mellon and Shirley-Anne Somerville, on their efforts to raise £5,000 for the learning disabilities charity ENABLE and wishes them the best of success in their forthcoming 350 km cycle ride through the Indian Himalayas. Supported by: Kay Ullrich*

S1M-1314 Colin Campbell: Congratulations to Scottish ENABLE India Charity Bike Riders—That the Parliament congratulates the two parliamentary researchers, John Mellon and Shirley-Anne Somerville, on their efforts to raise £5,000 for the learning disabilities charity ENABLE and wishes them the best of success in their forthcoming 350 km cycle ride through the Indian Himalayas. Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1314 Congratulations to Scottish ENABLE India Charity Bike Riders (lodged on 2 November 2000) Michael Russell*, Donald Gorrie*, Fergus Ewing*

S1M-1314 Congratulations to Scottish ENABLE India Charity Bike Riders (lodged on 2 November 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Irene McGugan*, Tricia Marwick*
